definitions.definition: An 11th-century Anglo-Saxon noblewoman who, according to legend , rode unclothed through the streets of Coventry to gain a remission of the oppressive taxation that her husband had imposed on his tenants .

main_definition: An 11th-century Anglo-Saxon noblewoman who, according to legend , rode unclothed through the streets of Coventry to gain a remission of the oppressive taxation that her husband had imposed on his tenants .
